articles.title: Heinz Promises To Catch Up To Americans' Demand Amid Ketchup Packet Shortage - NPR
articles.description: The pandemic is causing another new, yet uniquely American, shortage — ketchup. Heinz says it has to up its production by 25% to meet the demand for the popular condiment.
articles.content:
Heinz, the country's largest ketchup supplier, promised to up ketchup production by 25% to make up for the shortage.
